data.title: Helps Going through Learning curve!
data.description:
Reading the Release Notes published by Apple,
 helps up declutter your mind,
 upon learning about new frameworks!

data.title: All in one place
data.description:
We, Interns at Nizek,
 have built this app,
 so that you would have all
 the release notes at the palm of your hand!

data.title: Comprehensive Data!
data.description:
All the major iOS releases, including
 their respective minor and revison releases
 are included in the app!
 Simply click on the version
 to head over to the Apple website!
